name: Fast Finger
description:
It's my first game ever made. It was a python project at start, but I decided to redone it in UE4 to train myself.

The goal is simple, reach the exit (top right) by passing all the checkpoints before the timer end. To move, just press the letter of the contiguous tile you want to move on. 

It need some balancing, but the core gameplay is here.

The game is only playable with keyboard.
